title: Track Annual CAM Reconciliation
description: It's year-end, and the property manager must reconcile the Common Area Maintenance (CAM) expenses for a commercial property.

tasks.description: Compile all actual CAM expenses for the property for the entire year.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent gathers all relevant invoices and expense records.

tasks.description: Calculate each tenant's pro-rata share of the actual expenses based on their leased square footage.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent accurately calculates each tenant's share.

tasks.description: Compare the actual charges to the estimated CAM charges paid by each tenant and issue a credit or invoice for the difference.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent generates and sends correct reconciliation statements to all tenants.
